homePage.subHeader: Zeraki Analytics provides the insight you need to make decisions
homePage.subHeader2: about your child, your class or your school.

features.heading: Why You Should Choose
features.content1: A fast and easily accessible system that can be used on the go
features.content2: Intuitive analytics that knows exactly what you are looking for
features.content3: Easy to set-up and use no preexisting knowledge of tech required
features.content4: On-site training for teachers and administration
features.content5: Round the clock access to an expert customer support team
features.content6: Hosted on cloud servers ensuring no loss of data

testimonial.sub_header: Our customers love us! Read what they have to say below
testimonial.content1: One of the main reasons we switched to Zeraki is how easy it is to use, and even if you get stuck, their customer care team will get you back on track in minutes
testimonial.content2: Zeraki analytics is very handy for the classroom of tomorrow. It is an absolutely valuable tool in the hands of the teacher for both examination analysis
testimonial.content3: Zeraki has really helped me save lots of time- I can analyze my exams, send texts to parents and enter marks all from one platform, Thank you Zeraki for your great product

about.content: Zeraki is all about using technology to solve some of the toughest challenges encountered in providing quality education in Africa. Our cutting edge solutions, provide insights that enable informed decision making, provide access to quality instruction and take the stress out of everyday administrative tasks. We strive to improve the lives of educators and students at every stage and in every setting. Our Core product, Zeraki analytics, is transforming the way educational data is collected, analyzed and used

purchases.info: To buy SMS credits via MPESA, use the details below:
purchases.noteText1: 1)  Input an amount greater than Ksh. 50/-
purchases.noteText2: 2)  Ensure that the account number you specify in MPESA is exactly as shown above i.e. SMS{{smsCode}}. If you ignore any letter or number, the payment will be rejected
purchases.noteText3: 3)  Once you make the payment, Safaricom will notify you that the payment has been made to {{paybillName}}
purchases.charges: SMS charges are Ksh. 1/- per SMS

compose.info1: Shown below is a template of the message that will be sent to the parents. The log-in details displayed are sample details, and the actual messages will contain the real credentials for each of the students
compose.info2: Dear parent, we have partnered with Zeraki to provide digital learning resources for our students to allow them to continue learning from home.
compose.info3: To access the platform, click the link below and download Zeraki Learning from Play Store: https://bit.ly/ZerakiLearning
compose.feeInfo: Dear parent, the schools integration with zeraki finance provides smooth fee payment at the comfort of your mobile phone.
compose.feeInfo2: To access the platform, click the link below and download Zeraki Analytics from Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ke.co.litemore.zanalytics
compose.info4: Click on sign in and use the following credentials to log in:
compose.info5: In case of any challenges, contact Zeraki on 0790 493 495

keyWordsList.competencyDesc: The overall expected capability of a learner at the end of a topic, term or year, after being exposed to a body of knowledge, skills and values
keyWordsList.descriptorDesc: Gives details on the extent to which the leaner has achieved the stipulated learning outcomes in a given topic
keyWordsList.genericSkillsDesc: These are higher order transferable soft skills that apply to all subjects and are commonly sought after in the 21st Century and the world of work
keyWordsList.identifierDesc: Is a label/grade that distinguishes learners according to their learning achievement of the set competencies
keyWordsList.scoreDesc: Refers to the average of the scores attained for the different learning outcomes that make up competency
keyWordsList.score1: Few Los achieved, but not sufficient for overall achievement
keyWordsList.score2: Many LOs achieved, enough for overall achievement
keyWordsList.score3: Most or all Los achieved for overall achievement

invoiceList.smsTemplate:
Hello Sir/Madam,

Greetings from Zeraki! Please note that the invoice for {{schoolName}} of {{amount}} is due in {{daysLeft}} days. Kindly make arrangements for the payment to be done before the due date to avoid disruption of services. Thank you for your continued support. In case of any challenges , contact your account manager , {{managerName}} on {{managerPhone}} or Zeraki Helpline on {{customerCareNumber}}.
